TFTCG Aequitas Draft FAQ
FAQ / Wave 5 / Characters /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Decepticon Pounce - Infiltrator

  1. If I have one face up Secret Action and one face down Secret Action, do I get +2 attack or +4 attack? [Source: Aequitas]
    You get +4 attack. The 'or' in "face up or face down" should be read as 'and/or'.
  2. If I have Secret Actions in my hand, scrap pile, under a character, or even in my KO area (say because of Daring Escape), do those count? [Source: Aequitas]
    No. Pounce counts only the Secret Actions in your played area.
